name: Doce Web
description:
DOCE is a strategy turn-based video-game from Smart Iguana Games based on their board game with the same name. 

Press the "Run Game" button on the game window above and once you are in the game menu navigate to the option "HOW TO" for quick and easy-to-understand instructions about how to play DOCE. 

More info: https://smartiguanagames.com/doce/
